body.description: Maximize storage and display space with the stylish RiverRidge Somerset Single Door Floor Cabinet that features classic design and attractive detailing such as inset door, drawer and side panels, coved top shelf and two-tone satin/mirror finish handles. Additional dimensions: Inner shelves: 12.63"W x 10.38"D and drawer: 8.75"W x 9.25"D x 4.13 "H.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Somerset Collection! Introducing our Somerset Bath Collection – where functionality meets elegance. Embrace the timeless charm of clean white finishes and sleek silver handles that effortlessly elevate your space. Perfect for both bath and laundry storage, these family-friendly products are designed with your convenience in mind. Our Somerset Bath Collection not only adds a touch of sophistication to your home but also offers practical solutions. Each piece features enclosed storage, ensuring your space stays clutter-free and organized. Worried about safety? Rest easy with our adjustable anti-tip wall anchors, providing extra stability and peace of mind, especially in homes with little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cabinet for a small bathroom. It is heavy & seems durable. I appreciate that the door aligned nicely and the drawer rolls smoothly. It was a bit tedious to assemble - especially attaching the drawer rollers, but I am pleased with the finished product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a small cabinet to put in our small bathroom. This one fits perfectly. It came very well packaged. It is a very sturdy, well made, cabinet. It did take a couple of hours to assemble but the instructions were very well laid out and the pieces were very well labeled. We found the cheapest price on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my space
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice cabinet, all the directions are accurate, all pieces are there, it does take about 4 hours to assemble. It’s very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok, but very cheap
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately the assembly wasn’t easy. Had screws that didn’t fit, things were not pre drilled and the back didn’t fit. It’s kinda flimsy and probably won’t last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for your money.
reviews.reviewText: Clear detailed instructions. Parts bags clearly labeled by letter to match instruction manual. All fabricated holes matched well. Cabinet parts very well finished. Nice compact cabinet. It doesn’t get better than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition to bathroom
reviews.reviewText: This piece of furniture fits well between the toilet and shower and matches the sink vanity so we’ll that someone might assume it was part of the original build. I intended for this cabinet to store towels and washcloths. It was a little too small for that, so instead we are using it for storing the backup toilet paper supply within easy reach of the toilet and we are putting the towels elsewhere, but we are happy with how that worked out because a larger cabinet would not have fit in the spot and this is a more convenient place to reach for a new roll of TP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy enough to put together. Very pretty! Bought to put one on each side of entertainment center and was great choice! More roomy than appears :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality - assembly long, but easy
reviews.reviewText: I was freaked out when I opened the box and saw how many parts there were to this. However after 1.5 hours, I can tell you there wasn’t single piece or screw that didn’t line up perfectly! That is so rare. And no dings in any of the wood pieces. I highly recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: It. Fit in to he small space
reviews.reviewText: All the pieces were there and marked well. Directions were easy to follow. A very nice unit for the price. Thank you

reviews.reviewerName: Dubois Inspirations and DesignsDubois Inspirations and Designs
reviews.reviewTitle: Super cute for small or awkward spaces
reviews.reviewText: Loved the depth of this product... Needed an addition to my bathroom vanity... Weird shaped room and didn't want to pay for a custom vanity. This was perfect.
I found that it had a bit of a smell for a few weeks until it aired out. Probably the finish or the materials. It’s fine now and I’m happy with the purchase.
Love it. Looks great once put together, easy instructions to follow provided.
This small storage unit fits perfectly near my bathroom vanity. It has ample storage for all of my odds and ends as well as a few towels.Very good purchase.
